member.name: T:FbParameterCollection
member.summary: Collects all parameters relevant to a FbCommand as well as their respective mappings to DataSet columns. This class cannot be inherited.
member.remarks: The number of the parameters in the collection must be equal to the number of parameter placeholders within the command text, or Firebird raises an error.

member.name: M:Contains(System.Object)
member.summary: Indicates whether a FbParameter exists in the collection.
member.param: A FbParameter object.
member.returns: true if the collection contains the FbParameter object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Contains(System.String)
member.summary: Indicates whether a FbParameter exists in the collection.
member.param: The name of the parameter to retrieve.
member.returns: true if the collection contains the parameter; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:IndexOf(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the location of the FbParameter in the collection with a specific parameter name.
member.param: The FbParameter object to locate.
member.returns: The zero-based location of the FbParameter in the collection.

member.name: M:IndexOf(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the location of the FbParameter in the collection with a specific parameter name.
member.param: The name of the parameter to retrieve.
member.returns: The zero-based location of the FbParameter in the collection.

member.name: M:Insert(System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the location of the FbParameter in the collection with a specific parameter name.
member.param: The zero-based index within the collection to insert the value parameter.
The FbParameter to add to the collection.
member.returns: The zero-based location of the FbParameter in the collection.

member.name: M:Remove(System.Object)
member.summary: Removes the specified FbParameter from the collection.
member.param: A FbParameter object to remove from the collection.
member.exception: The parameter is not a FbParameter.
The parameter does not exist in the collection.

member.name: M:Clear()
member.summary: Removes all items from the collection.

member.name: M:GetEnumerator()
member.summary: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

member.name: M:RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the specified FbParameter from the collection using a specific index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the parameter.
member.exception: The specified index does not exist.

member.name: M:RemoveAt(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the specified FbParameter from the collection.
member.param: The name of the parameter to remove.

member.name: M:Add(System.Object)
member.summary: Adds the specified FbParameter object to the collection.
member.param: The FbParameter to be added.
member.returns: A reference to the new FbParameter object.
member.exception: The parameter passed was not a FbParameter.

member.name: M:Add(FirebirdSql.Data.Firebird.FbParameter)
member.summary: Adds the specified FbParameter object to the collection.
member.param: The FbParameter to be added.
member.returns: A reference to the new FbParameter object.

member.name: M:Add(System.String,FirebirdSql.Data.Firebird.FbType)
member.summary: Adds the specified FbParameter object to the collection.
member.param: Parameter name
Parameter type
member.returns: A reference to the new FbParameter object.

member.name: M:Add(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds a FbParameter to the FbParameterCollection with the parameter name and the data type.
member.param: The name of the parameter.
The value of the parameter.
member.returns: A reference to the new FbParameter object.

member.name: M:Add(System.String,FirebirdSql.Data.Firebird.FbType,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a FbParameter to the FbParameterCollection with the parameter name the data type and the source column.
member.param: The name of the parameter.
One of the FbType values.
The name of the source column.
member.returns: A reference to the new FbParameter object.

member.name: M:Add(System.String,FirebirdSql.Data.Firebird.FbType,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a FbParameter to the FbParameterCollection with the parameter name, the data type, the parameter size (column width), and the source column name.
member.param: The name of the parameter.
One of the FbType values.
The size of the parameter (width of the column).
The name of the source column.
member.returns: A reference to the new FbParameter object.

member.name: M:CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies FbParameterCollection to the specified array.
member.param: The Array to copy elements into.
The index from which to start copying into the array parameter.

member.name: P:Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets or sets the FbParameter with the specified name.
member.param: The name of the parameter to retrieve.

member.name: P:Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets the FbParameter at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the parameter to retrieve.

member.name: P:Count
member.summary: Gets the number of FbParameter objects in the collection.
member.value: The number of FbParameter objects in the collection.
